about.title: From scattered tasks to a purposeful week
about.content:
When every meeting adds a new request, it’s easy to lose sight of what truly matters.

Flowly highlights exactly what needs your attention right now with reinforced contrast and automations that eliminate manual tweaks.
bullets: High-contrast interface that keeps the focus on decisive work
AI assistant that reorganizes priorities in seconds
Visual alerts for critical deadlines and dependencies
Intuitive reports that narrate your week’s results
Integrations that keep your team and tools in sync
